text:
@nidhiindiatv why is kcet not postponing?? Is kcet the last exam we are writing??? we are writing JEE NEET..!!! what about students who get infected with covid-19 after writing kcet exam?? who is responsible.? how will they prepare for futher xams??? 
#kcetpostpone
#kcet
#kcetpostponeagain
